descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add to Group
options.description: Add an existing user to a group

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a user

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a user

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a user

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many users

options.name: Remove From Group
options.description: Remove a user from a group

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a user

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

deviceId.name: deviceId
deviceId.description: Select the device you want to retrieve
deviceId.ai_hint: Select the device you want to retrieve

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

projection.name: projection

options.name: Don't Include
options.description: Do not include any custom fields for the user

options.name: Custom
options.description: Include custom fields from schemas requested in Custom Schema Names or IDs

options.name: Include All
options.description: Include all fields associated with this user

projection.description: What subset of fields to fetch for this user
projection.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

includeChildOrgunits.name: includeChildOrgunits
includeChildOrgunits.description: Whether to include devices from organizational units below your specified organizational unit

filter.name: filter

options.name: customer
options.description: The unique ID for the customer's Google Workspace account

options.name: domain
options.description: The domain name. Use this field to get groups from a specific domain.

options.name: query
options.description: Query string to filter the results. Follow Google Admin SDK documentation. More info.

options.name: showDeleted
options.description: Whether retrieve the list of deleted users

filter.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

sort.name: sort

values.name: orderBy
values.description: Field to sort the results by

sort.description: Define sorting rules for the results
sort.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateOptions.name: updateOptions

options.displayName: Move to Organizational Unit Name or ID
options.name: orgUnitPath
options.description: The full path to the organizational unit. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: annotatedUser
options.description: The annotated user of the device

options.name: annotatedLocation
options.description: The annotated location of the device
options.placeholder: e.g. Mountain View help desk Chromebook

options.name: annotatedAssetId
options.description: The annotated asset ID of a device

options.name: notes
options.description: Add notes to a device

updateOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

action.name: action

options.name: Enabled
options.description: Re-enable a disabled chromebook

options.name: Disabled
options.description: Disable a chromebook

action.description: Set the status of a device
action.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

groupId.description: Select the group to perform the operation on
groupId.ai_hint: Select the group to perform the operation on

email.name: email
email.description: The group's email address. If your account has multiple domains, select the appropriate domain for the email address. The email must be unique
email.ai_hint: The group's email address. If your account has multiple domains, select the appropriate domain for the email address. The email must be unique

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: archived
options.description: Whether user is archived

options.name: suspendUi
options.description: Whether to set the user as suspended. If set to OFF, the user will be reactivated. If not added, the status will remain unchanged.

options.name: changePasswordAtNextLogin
options.description: Whether the user is forced to change their password at next login

options.name: password
options.description: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.

values.name: primary
values.description: Whether this is the user's primary phone number. A user may only have one primary phone number.

options.name: primaryEmail
options.description: The user's primary email address. This property is required in a request to create a user account. The primaryEmail must be unique and cannot be an alias of another user.

values.name: type
values.description: The type of the email account

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Select the user to perform the operation on

properties.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

userId.ai_hint: Select the user to perform the operation on

password.name: password
password.description: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.
password.ai_hint: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.

username.name: username
username.description: The username that will be set to the user. Example: If you domain is example.com and you set the username to n.smith then the user's final email address will be n.smith@example.com.
username.ai_hint: The username that will be set to the user. Example: If you domain is example.com and you set the username to n.smith then the user's final email address will be n.smith@example.com.

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
domain.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

output.name: output

options.name: Simplified
options.description: Only return specific fields: kind, ID, primaryEmail, name (with subfields), isAdmin, lastLoginTime, creationTime, and suspended

options.name: Raw
options.description: Return all fields from the API response

options.name: Select Included Fields
options.description: Choose specific fields to include

output.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Fields to include in the response when "Select Included Fields" is chosen
fields.ai_hint: Fields to include in the response when "Select Included Fields" is chosen

customFieldMask.name: customFieldMask
customFieldMask.description: A comma-separated list of schema names. All fields from these schemas are fetched. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
customFieldMask.ai_hint: A comma-separated list of schema names. All fields from these schemas are fetched. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation IN ["get", "update", "changeStatus"] AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'deviceId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'device' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation IN ["get", "getAll"] AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'projection'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'includeChildOrgunits'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'filter'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateOptions'
IF operation == 'changeStatus' AND resource == 'device' THEN SHOW parameter 'action'
IF resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'group' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'filter'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation IN ["addToGroup", "delete", "get", "removeFromGroup", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation IN ["addToGroup", "removeFromGroup"] THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstName'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'username'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'domain'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'select' AND operation == 'get' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'projection'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'user' AND /projection == 'custom' THEN SHOW parameter 'customFieldMask'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'select' AND operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'projection'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' AND /projection == 'custom' THEN SHOW parameter 'customFieldMask'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'filter'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
